abstract: Farhad Manjoo State of the Art column posits that sexual discrimination suit filed by Ellen Pao against Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers has succeeded in opening up dialog about women in tech industry, despite fact that jury found Pao's claims without merit; notes that revelations about many slights Pao received have resonated with women across the industry.
lead_paragraph: While the verdict on Friday was a defeat for Ms. Pao, the trial has blown open a conversation about the status of women in an industry that has always been buttoned up about its shortcomings.

headline.main: Ellen Pao Disrupts How Silicon Valley Does Business
headline.print_headline: A Woman Disrupts How Silicon Valley Does Business

snippet: While the verdict on Friday was a defeat for Ms. Pao, the trial has blown open a conversation about the status of women in an industry that has always been buttoned up about its shortcomings.
